meanings.sent1: The stalwart dog always stayed by his side, never leaving him alone.
meanings.sent2: She admired her stalwart friend for always being there when she needed help.
meanings.sent3: The stalwart tree stood tall in the storm, unwavering against the wind.
meanings.sent4: His stalwart determination to succeed was like a beacon guiding him through challenges.
meanings.sent5: The image of the stalwart knight defending the castle was etched in her mind.

meanings.definition: a loyal, reliable, and hardworking supporter or participant
meanings.sent1: The community's stalwart always volunteered to help those in need.
meanings.sent2: He was known as the team's stalwart, always giving his best in every game.
meanings.sent3: The stalwart of the group, he never missed a chance to make everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: She relied on her stalwart friend to guide her through tough times like a compass.
meanings.sent5: The stalwart of the family, he held everyone together with his unwavering support.
